name: Clickbait (blinry)
description:
Close all popups to win. Please disregard all helpful advice any paperclips might give you. :P

We recommend playing this game with a hardware mouse.

Controls:

  • mouse + left mouse button
  • m to mute the music
  • If you get stuck, you can use 9 and 0 to go to the previous/next control mode.

Made with Godot! <3 Original score by winniehell.
